entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -16.9°C
Wind: SW 36 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
